rule.name: AB_SAILUI_generateSAILCode
rule.description: Displays the Sail Code for the Form

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: 'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_FrmVersionAndCmpntDesign'(Id:1, Name:"task", Label:"form", Version:1, componentList:{'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_FrmCmpntsDesign'(Id:"160407043240", name:"tbd_1", parentCondition:"OR", responseType:"Section", columnIndex:1, seqIndex:1, parentList:{'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_CmpntParent'(parentComponentId:"160407044144", matchAnyValueFlag:true)}), 'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_FrmCmpntsDesign'(Id:"160407043250", name:"tbd_2", label:"Text 1", parentCondition:"OR", responseType:"Text", columnIndex:1, seqIndex:2, sectionComponentId:"160407043240"), 'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_FrmCmpntsDesign'(Id:"160407044029", name:"tbd_3", label:"text 2", parentCondition:"OR", responseType:"Paragraph", columnIndex:1, seqIndex:3, sectionComponentId:"160407043240"), 'type!{urn:com:psi:types:AB}AB_FrmCmpntsDesign'(Id:"160407044144", name:"tbd_4", label:"text 4", parentCondition:"OR", responseType:"Text", columnIndex:1, seqIndex:4)})
